Summary: 4am, went to bathroom, lights in BR, police lightsetc? off toilet looked out window, street, up, silver triangle object. 3 white1red light, low to light up my toilet area.
divs: Sighting DetailsWoke up at approximately 4:00am while sitting on the toilet to void (pee) lights lihtg up the room while I was sitting there. My thought was " polices or someone walking their dog shining light in my window at my house. Finished voiding, stood up looked down to street (nothing)?, looked up, across street low enough I could see lights in room, bottom of a silver triangular shaped vessel. Three white lights one red. Very low to earth could see all. Went toget get glasses and see if husband awake, returned to window, not in view. Vessel heading northwest.
